Premier League
Arsenal - Kolasinac: "√ñzil is a bit unhappy lately"
Sead Kolasinac, the Arsenal defender, spoke about the case of his friend and partner Mesut √ñzil.
02 Nov 2019, 14:40 by Hugo Deloraine



ArsenalAn unfortunate finalist of the last Europa League, the Arsenal Gunners will again try their luck in the second European competition. And find the Champions League through the championship.Icon Sport

Arsenal: the possible eleven of the season




Mesut √ñzil has a lot to say about Arsenal. Author of benefits in half-hearted, the German international did not seem to have the favor of his coach Unai Emery at the beginning of the season. However, the Gunner begins to graze again time of play. Holder, during the show in Carabao Cup against Liverpool (5-5), √ñzil showed beautiful things. His teammate and friend, Sead Kolasinak spoke on the former Madrid.




"He's doing everything he can"




Sead Kolasinac + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

At the microphone of Premier League Productions, he said: "Mesut is a very motivated player, he is a little unhappy lately, but we never see him during training and he does everything he can. He's doing extra sessions to make sure he's at the level he needs to be. " Will Mesut √ñzil have more playing time in the coming weeks?
